txt.en: 'We... we cannot stay here, [placeholder].'
Instance: A Final Vengeance
'Quickly! We may not have much time!'
'Golodir!'
'Golodir! You poor fool!'
Talk to Golodir
'Amegil did not repent of the words he spoke to Golodir, but he did tell me which way he seemed to go: here, to this encampment of Orcs. We may yet find Golodir, if we hurry!'
Talk to Corunir

'I am satisfied... [placeholder]. If the Gondorians... know of what they speak... then my death... will see Mordirith defeated....

'Corunir... my friend... when this war is over... I ask that you ensure... safety for Wenda....'

Golodir is quiet for a long moment. When he finally speaks again, it is for the last time.

'It is enough... for me... to die thinking of Lorniel... as I always...'
'He is gone. I... I do not know what to do, [placeholder].'
'Run away, little man!'
Despite his broken body, Golodir smiles at you
Corunir hopes that you will be able to find Golodir before he comes to harm.
Corunir mourns the loss of his friend on the Pelennor.
'That is a pity. I could use the sport!'
'I have ended the lives of so many. You will not survive this encounter!'
You have come with Corunir to an outpost on the Pelennor where the fighting has been thick.
DNT - Blah!
'I will not run from the like of you.'
'Perhaps not.'
DNT - Blah!
'But I will be satisfied to give my last removing you, and your master, from this world!'
Golodir felled the mighty Thr√∫grath, but his body is broken and he will not survive.
'Foolish? I do not think so... my old friend...'
'I was tormented by Mordirith... for years...'
'At last I will escape him... and go beyond his reach...'
Talk to Corunir
<rgb=#FF0000>Corunir must not be defeated</rgb>
Find Golodir
Golodir has gone ahead. Can you find him before it is too late?
